title: Ticket #7548: Fix DAGMan warning message related to job events
description:
DAGMan is incorrectly reporting a warning message related to job event tracking. The following message always shows up after a job completes:

Warning for node <nodeName>: unexpected _gotEvents value for proc 0: 0!

This warning appears because the node is not flagged as having been executed. We need to figure out why this flag is not getting set, and add it, or otherwise fix the conditions under which this message shows up.
